fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health
eu_initiatives: All relevant pharmaceutical and health care initiatives, including Falsified Medicines Directive, Organ supply Directive, European Commission Incentives Review, Member State collaboration in the area of medicines pricing, EUnetHTA, orphan disease legislation, European Medicines Agency and regulatory policy, etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Astellas Pharma SA Parc Scientifique Erasme Square Marie Curie 50 (Maurice Careme), Batiment 5, 1er etage
goals__remit: Providing high quality medicines in areas of high unmet medical need
relevant_communication: We run a European Roundtable on combatting hospital infections with C-Difficile. All of our other engagement is currently through the European Federation of Pharmaceutical industries and Associations.
